Aaron giving a talk at WordCamp Minneapolis. Photo by Found Art Photography

I speak, sometimes even to other people!

I sometimes speak at conferences, meetups and tech groups.

Some of the past engagements I’ve had the honor of speaking at:

  • WordCamp Milwaukee 2012
  • WordCamp Grand Rapids 2012 - Video
  • WordCamp Chicago 2012
  • Lake/Kenosha County PHP Users Group
  • WordCamp Providence 2012
  • Milwaukee WordPress Meetup
  • WordPress Lake County Meetup
  • Chicago Northwest Suburbs WordPress Meetup
  • WordSesh 2013
  • CMS Expo 2013

You can find slides to my past talks over at speakerdeck.
